title: 820-00165: Fan spins, stops then starts but board won't boot
message:
Originally the board was dead which i isolated to the smc. Once replaced, the fan would spin for like 12 seconds, stop and then start spinning and stays spinning but no board activity, no usb activity either. I did noticed the bluetooth module was getting very hot so removed it but the board still doesn't boot up. I

intruder_l - 3.0v
All_sys_PWDGD - 3.3
PPVCC_S0_CPU_PH1 - 1.8v

Any suggestions

title: 820-00165: Fan spins, stops then starts but board won't boot
message:
PLT_RESET_L comes on?
Did you try known good BIOS file?

title: 820-00165: Fan spins, stops then starts but board won't boot
message:
PLT_RESET_L - 3.3
And yes, put good bios on with same result.

title: 820-00165: Fan spins, stops then starts but board won't boot
message:
Check CPU_VCCST_PWRGD and CPU_VR_READY.
Do you get all voltages from page 11?
Must also check all SPI Bus Series Termination resistors and their traces.
Q5150 and its adjacent resistors is other point of interest.

Heat PCH/CPU for test as last resource.
